channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: Join the Vocal-Synth Community on VocaLounge!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In search of some new friends in the amazing vocal-synth community to hang around with? Then you must absolutely take a look at the community hub VocaLounge, a Matsodon server filled with vocal synthesizer enthusiasts for you to meet and interact! Founded in January of this year by producer Lystrialle, VocaLounge is driven with the …

The post Join the Vocal-Synth Community on VocaLounge! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In search of some new friends in the amazing vocal-synth community to hang around with? Then you must absolutely take a look at the community hub VocaLounge, a Matsodon server filled with vocal synthesizer enthusiasts for you to meet and interact!

Founded in January of this year by producer Lystrialle, VocaLounge is driven with the desire to bring the western vocal synth community together and allow both fans and creators to meet and have fun. Their goal is to achieve a new level of community interaction: creating a hub where enthusiasts can share artwork, musical content, and all of their love for their beloved virtual singers. As of last month, they recently completed a community event titled the “Low-Effort Miku Zine“, which was a lighthearted collaborative compilation of low effort art depicting our beloved twin-tailed Vocaloid.

But there is more! Thanks to the various tags and even a fully functional Ambassador account, you can also easily get in contact with both people that joined the server or just use Matsodon’s platform in general. You are allowed to go off topic and post about interests outside vocal synths too, of course!

Also, don’t forget that Lystrialle, MystSaphyr, and the other moderators will always be ready to help you where you might need it!

Join this growing community and have fun!

Publishing artworks, covers with your favorite virtual singers, and even casually chatting with new people is an absolute bliss within the community, and we encourage you all to try it out!

The website might be free of charge but it needs funds to continue running, so if you’d like to contribute you can donate to the cause via LiberaPay or Ko-Fi!

Links

VocaLounge

VocaLounge Twitter

Lystrialle

The post Join the Vocal-Synth Community on VocaLounge! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
On April 1st, the Magical Mirai official Twitter account revealed the accomodation options planned for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 Osaka event were cancelled for those outside of Japan due to the ongoing COVID-19 outbreak. 【海外在住の方へお知らせ】「マジカルミライ 2020」宿泊プランについてhttps://t.co/o8bynkCrq2#マジカルミライ2020　#初音ミク — 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) April 2, 2020 Read the official statement below: “The World Health Organization (WHO) has …

The post “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On April 1st, the Magical Mirai official Twitter account revealed the accomodation options planned for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 Osaka event were cancelled for those outside of Japan due to the ongoing COVID-19 outbreak.

【海外在住の方へお知らせ】
「マジカルミライ 2020」宿泊プランについてhttps://t.co/o8bynkCrq2#マジカルミライ2020　#初音ミク

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) April 2, 2020

Read the official statement below:

“The World Health Organization (WHO) has formally declared the Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak as a pandemic. We had been preparing infectious disease control for those who applied for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 in Osaka Accommodation Plan, but in order to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 we came to a decision to close applications for those located overseas.

Therefore, we will be only accepting applications from those who live in Japan. Thank you for your understanding and your cooperation.”

So now you know! Be very careful if you’re in Japan, make sure to follow the health etiquette, and do not place yourself at risk by going out unless absolutely necessary!

Please continue to read our other articles here at VNN, we’re glad to have you with us.

Sources

Magical Mirai on Twitter

The post “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020” Performers List Announced!

item.description:
Today it was announced via Twitter that the official “Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020” event performers list has been released. The list is an exciting one as many known faces surface to make this event a one-of-a-kind experience for everyone in love with vocal synthesizers and alike. Check them out below! Virtual Singers …

The post “Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020” Performers List Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Today it was announced via Twitter that the official “Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020” event performers list has been released.

The list is an exciting one as many known faces surface to make this event a one-of-a-kind experience for everyone in love with vocal synthesizers and alike.

Check them out below!

Virtual Singers

(From left to right: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, MEIKO, KAITO)

Kodo

(From left to right: Eiichi Saito, Yoshie Abe, Shogo Komatsuzaki, Jiyo, Yasuki Miura, Ryotaro Ikenaga, Yuta Kimura, Keita Saegusa, Hiroki Hirata, Chie Yamawaki, Moe Niiyama)

Special Band

(From left to right: Takaaki Misawa (Guitar), KAYO-CHAAN (Keyboard), Osamu Kobayashi (Bass), Kikushima “KIKU” Ryoichi (Drums))

Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020 Theme Song

The event’s theme song is “NEPPUU ~ Hot Air ~“ by Mikito P feat. Hatsune Miku.

Sources

Kodo Miku Official on Twitter

The post “Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live 2020” Performers List Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today we’re introducing the latest Hatsune Miku Mobile content update for April! The cherry blossoms are in full bloom and spring is coming to Hatsune Miku Mobile, isn’t that awesome!? ■ Android Live Wallpaper ■ Wallpaper Miku and KAITO Wallpapers ■ iPhone Wallpaper A Cute wallpaper with a refreshing blue sky and Miku …

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Today we’re introducing the latest Hatsune Miku Mobile content update for April!

The cherry blossoms are in full bloom and spring is coming to Hatsune Miku Mobile, isn’t that awesome!?

■ Android Live Wallpaper

■ Wallpaper
Miku and KAITO Wallpapers

■ iPhone Wallpaper A
Cute wallpaper with a refreshing blue sky and Miku in her uniform!

■ Stamp (common to Android / iPhone)
Perfect for Miku and Luka in the spring!

Get access to some bonus readable e-magazines!

This month’s merchandise are the “Jigsaw Puzzle / Sakura Miku Big Towel / Acrylic Stand & Can Badge & Key Holder”


This month’s song is “Love Magic Disco” by EasyPop

How To Install The April Update

  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “Sugotoku” , you can access it from the menu Character / Deco-mail / Stamp.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices (excluding some models) that support “Sugotoku Contents”
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED004
  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “au Smart Pass”, you can install the update from Categories / Entertainment / Character.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices compatible with “au Smart Pass” (excluding some models)
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED011
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile for App Pass
    After subscribing to App Pass, you can install the update from the “Entertainment” category.
    Compatible devices: Android devices that support App Pass (iOS is not supported)
    Link: http://www.softbank.jp/mobile/service/app-pass/
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile 500
    Price: ¥ 550 / month (docomo sp mode payment, au easy payment, S! Collective payment)
    Supported devices: iOS and Android smartphones (excluding some models)
    Link: http: //app.mikumoba.jp/RED014

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone!

Crypton Future Media made an official announcement today via the official MIKU EXPO Twitter account where they started by profusely apologizing due to some unforeseen issues with the issuance of refunds for the tickets.

You can read the full statement below:

Don’t forget that the MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour was postponed for September-October 2020 from its original date in April due to the expanding pandemic of the feared COVID-19.

Sources

MIKU EXPO on Twitter

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & Canada Tour Ticket Refund Information appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Comiket 98 Has Been Cancelled!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Comiket, Japan’s largest doujinshi (self-published works like manga or novels) publishing market and anime convention has decided to cancel its 98th event due to the coronavirus pandemic that’s affecting everyone worldwide. The cancellation of Comiket will be the first in 45 years of history since its first conception. With a little over a month before …

The post Comiket 98 Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Comiket, Japan’s largest doujinshi (self-published works like manga or novels) publishing market and anime convention has decided to cancel its 98th event due to the coronavirus pandemic that’s affecting everyone worldwide.

The cancellation of Comiket will be the first in 45 years of history since its first conception. With a little over a month before the event was planned, Comiket organizers apologized profusely with their fan base and explained their reasoning for the cancellation in an official announcement on their website.

“Comiket 98 (to be held from May 2nd to May 5th, 2020 at Tokyo Big Sight) will be cancelled in an attempt to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 infection aka Coronavirus.

The government and the Tokyo Metropolitan Government are attempting to prevent any and all large-scale events to avoid the spread of the Coronavirus infection due to its dangerous nature. This is reinforced via the Japan Recommendation bill that was agreed on with a panel of experts on March 19th, 2020.

For us it was very difficult decision to cancel the event but the safety of everyone attending is more important than anything else. We hope you can understand.”

Refunds & Merchandise

Comiket will be offering refunds for vendors who have already paid for parking and lottery allotted positions in the event hall.

The Comiket 98 catalog will still be sold as printing and binding has already begun, would-be attendees and fans are asked to purchase the catalog in spite of the event cancellation, to show their support for the event.

Sources

Comiket Official Website

The post Comiket 98 Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hey everyone! Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well. In an official …

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone!

Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well.

In an official statement on the Hatsune Miku Official Blog, organizers said the following:

“Regarding the performance of “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond”, we have continued to make adjustments to distribute live audience performances via streaming but due to the expanding infectious state of the coronavirus disease we have decided, at the request of Tokyo’s Governor Koike, to cancel the scheduled live video distribution.

COVID-19 has made it impossible for us to provide live audiences and performers the required safety on a health standpoint.

We deeply apologize to many of you who were looking forward to our show.”

Refunds

Nico Nico Live Broadcasting
For users who have already purchased the livestream ticket for the show, your Nico Nico Points will be returned soon as possible. Once the Nic0 Nico Points have been returned, we will contact you with the email address you’ve registered at the time of your purchase.

We urge you to wait until you’re contacted.

TwitCasting
Refunds will be issued via bank transfer from S.A.P.

Click here for more details.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Twitter

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago! Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual  Introducing “VOCALOID Fes” VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music. Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like …

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago!

Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual 

Introducing “VOCALOID Fes”

VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music.

Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like “VOCALOID DJ” will be featured as well.

You can watch VOCALOID Fes live on the net! More details on this are available by reading our article here.

“Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020”

The “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” is scheduled to be take place April 12 to April 19, 2020! Eight days of pure VOCALOID fun!

During the event, at the top part of the Nico Nico official website will feature what’s called the “Net Super Meeting Room“, where various entertainment companies existing in Japan will gather with the aim to become Japan’s largest internet festival.

In addition, this event will go beyond Nico Nico to form alliances with various media sites and companies in order to expand Japanese net culture to the world. Details will be announced at a later date.

Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Sponsored by NTT

  • Date: April 12 to April 19, 2020
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Super Special Sponsor: NTT
  • Official Website: Here
  • Official Twitter: Here

Sponsors List

Super Special Sponsor: NTT

Sponsored by VOCALOID Fes: Tobu Top Tours Co., Ltd.

Other Sponsors: Airbnb / # Compass-Battle Providence Analysis System

Super Kabuki Supported by NTT Performance Overview

  • Performance Name: おとぎぞうしこいのすがたえ
  • Broadcast Date and Time:

April 18, 2020 @ 14:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga
April 19, 2020 @ 18:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga

  • Performers: Shido Nakamura, Miku Hatsune, Butterfly Nakamura, Kuniya Sawamura and others
  • Screenplay: Ryo Matsuoka
  • Director: Kanjuro Fujima
  • Song: “Romeo and Cinderella”
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Production: Shochiku Co., Ltd./Dwango Co., Ltd.
  • Production Assistance: Crypton Future Media Co., Ltd.
  • Super Special Sponsor / Technical Assistance: NTT

Check out the “Super Kabuki 2020” Official Website for more information.

VOCALOID Fes

“Vocaloid Live”

Performers: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Gumi, Otomachi Una, flower, Yukari Yuzuki

“Vocaloid DJ”

Dates & Times: April 18, 2020 @ 18:00 – 20:20 PM JPT
1) 18:00 – 18:45 PM JPT – “sasakure.UK & Pinocchiopie” Live DJ (Free)
2) 18:45 – 19:50 PM JPT – “flower & Yukari Yukari” Live DJ (Free)
3) 19:50 – 20:20 PM JPT – VOCALOID Live (Paid)

Click here for more details!

Ticket Price: ¥ 4,800 (tax included)

Click here for relevant information regarding ticket purchasing.

“VOCALOID Fes Merchandise”

VOCALOID Fes’ exceptional merchandise will be available for purchase for everybody!

These include but are not limited to:

  • Limited Edition Illustration designed by popular artist “Yasan“
  • T-shirt (M / L / XL size): 2,800 yen (tax included)
  • Muffler Towel: 1,500 yen (tax included)
  • Acrylic Stand Key Holders: 800 yen (tax included)

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The “BUNRAKU Beyond” event has been officially cancelled by the organizers due to the new COVID-19 pandemic. However, it was decided that a live video performance will take place instead. In response to a request from the Japanese government to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus sickness, the organizer has considered not to hold …

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The “BUNRAKU Beyond” event has been officially cancelled by the organizers due to the new COVID-19 pandemic. However, it was decided that a live video performance will take place instead.

In response to a request from the Japanese government to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus sickness, the organizer has considered not to hold a “BUNRAKU Beyond” performance on March 29. As it was determined that the pandemic that’s occurring worldwide was too severe, the decision to cancel the event was made as a way to safeguard everybody’s health.

Following the cancellation of this performance, the organizers will be distributing a part of the program as a paid live video event so that fans can see “Ningyo Joruri and Hatsune Miku Competition” on March 29, the original performance date (the time is yet to be confirmed).

There’s plans to mail “BUNRAKU Beyond” goodies and merchandise as well, with details being announced on the SAP website in the near future.

Refund Information

Customers purchasing at the SAP Ticket Store can request a refund here.

Lawson Ticket holders can request their refund here. (Refund period from March 14 @ 15:00 PM JPT until April 17 @ 18:00 PM JPT)

Organizer’s Message

“We are planning to have a collaborative performance with Ningyo Joruri. Ticket purchases for this performance will be announced on the SAP website when the performance details and date have been confirmed.”

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” Event Has Been Cancelled! appeared first on VNN.
